column5: Located in a gated community, we offer a 2 bedroom/2 bathroom fully furnished golf villa at the South Padre Island Golf Club and Resort located in Laguna Vista, Texas, just minutes to Padre Island. The unit is just a two minute walk from the community pool and occupancy allows access to the eighteen hole golf course, putting green, tennis courts, exercise room, and dining room.
column8: 2 BR/2 BA Golf Villa located at SPI Golf Club
